column5: hi guys!  here i have some pics from the last too weeks, from a local pond near Kitchener got some largemouth and some smallmouth from Maitland, around Wingham area...enjoy...

nice few days out for sure! try that same crayfish bait on a shakey head jig and see what you think.  it makes the bait stand up tail to the ground and claws up so if you test it (same amount of fish vs...) I would love to know how you make out.  for me the jig head is working well...
Right on gino    Beauties Thanks for sharing! Leechman
